title: New Beginnings
description: New Beginnings is jammed packed with personal stories that don't sugar coat a damn thing. I am real, I am honest, I am me! I have chosen to share my truths, lessons and knowledge in hopes that you will take away something inspiring to support you along your journey. If you have picked up this book, believe that it is for a reason. To all of the mommas of the world, to anyone who has experienced loss or abandonment, those struggling to live by their life's purpose, this book is for you. I love you all and appreciate your existence on this earth. I truly hope that you find what you are passionate about and live by it day in and day out. You matter, you are loved, you are you. Thank you for allowing me to support you on your precious journey.
author: Alysha Smith
